item.title: 'Deny,' 'defend,' 'depose': UnitedHealthcare CEO killing shell casings had words written on them
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson was fatally shot by a masked gunman in New York City on his way to a UnitedHealth Group investor meeting Wednesday...

item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO shooting: Photos show face of person sought by NYPD for questioning
item.description: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, whose company is the biggest private health insurance payer in the United States, was fatally shot in New York.

item.title: What Fed chief Powell said about crypto that may have aided bitcoin's rally to $100,000
item.description: Powell said bitcoin is not a challenge for traditional currencies such as the U.S. dollar but rather for gold.

item.title: Southwest and American airlines raise sales outlooks, shares jump
item.description: Southwest and American airlines forecast stronger-than-expected revenue for the fourth quarter.

item.title: Jefferies turns bullish on this alcohol and spirits stock, sees nearly 20% upside
item.description: The alcohol company will bottom next year and chart a path to recovery in 2026, according to Jefferies.
